column4: hi, anyone knows how to recover info, data or files out of a disaster with raid-1?
no clue, but since RAID 1 is mirror, I would figure that you would restore from the functioning disk

my trouble is that after a missconfiguration happened bit later of the instalation and now i managed to synch the raid, but  the somehow restored info in the raid is not the lates one but the  near installation version
unfortunately I don't anything significant about RAIDs :(
